name: Creature Type
description: Every creature, including every player character, has a tag that identifies the kind of creature it is. Most player characters are of the Humanoid type. The creature types are: Aberration, Beast, Celestial, Construct, Dragon, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, Giant, Humanoid, Monstrosity, Ooze, Plant, and Undead. These types don't have rules themselves, but some rules in the game affect creatures of certain types in different ways.
